title: THE SLAIN FAITH
memoryVerse: God also bearing them witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will. Heb.2:4
meaning: Slain faith is the faith that has been killed, murdered, assassinated, butchered and eliminated from functioning as a child of God, and by that elimination, faith is now unjust he can no more live by faith

content.header: The only way we can enjoy the benefits of life is by living by faith.
A man who lives by faith is a manufacturer, because faith is used to produce the substances you need for manufacturing what you desire or want- Heb. 11: 1
So you cannot manufacture without faith
list: A man whose faith has been slain or butchered cannot manufacture anything, in attempt to manufacture without faith what he will produce will be complain, murmuring and failure.
The worst death that can happen to a man is to die the death of faith.

body.header: HOW TO KNOW WHEN THE FAITH OF A MAN IS SLAIN -NUM.13:17-30

content.header: When the faith of a man is slain, he sees himself weaker and others stronger than him-V31
list: The reason why they fail is because they are not strong like others.
They always have reason for their failure and put blame on others

content.header: When the faith of a man is slain he spreads bad and evil report among the people –V32
list: Report that is not true of God's mind.
They give untrue report about their leader, master, head and others- Num.14:10

title: THE SLAIN FAITH
memoryVerse: God also bearing them witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will. Heb.2:4
meaning: Slain faith is the faith that has been killed, murdered, assassinated, butchered and eliminated from functioning as a child of God, and by that elimination, faith is now unjust he can no more live by faith

body.header: HOW TO KNOW WHEN THE FAITH OF A MAN IS SLAIN -NUM.13:17-30 (Continuation)

content.header: When the faith of a man is slain he speaks negative things about himself- V33
list: He doesn't see good things about himself, what he does or the future

content.header: When a man's faith is slain he rebels against God, master and leader
list: He doesn't see anything good about God, his master or leader any more- Num.14: 8-9

body.header: WHEN THE FAITH OF A SHEPHERD IS SLAINNUM.14:1-9

content.header: When a leader's faith is slain, If not corrected he will draw others in the same way of error
list: He sees himself as incompetent – Num.13:31
He Is unable to influence people positively
The people's faith will be killed by him
The people's hope will be killed – Pro.13:12

title: THE SLAIN FAITH
memoryVerse: God also bearing them witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will. Heb.2:4
meaning: Slain faith is the faith that has been killed, murdered, assassinated, butchered and eliminated from functioning as a child of God, and by that elimination, faith is now unjust he can no more live by faith

body.header: WHEN THE FAITH OF A SHEPHERD IS SLAINNUM.14:1-9 (Continuation)

content.header: He cannot lead the sheep to the promised land - Deut.26:8-9, Num.32:11
He cannot stop or correct evil dealings – Titus 1:13
His words cannot encourage or challenge the people to good works. 2Tim.2:2
He will put blame on the sheep- 2Corin.8:20, Gal.2:11
He has no authority over the sheep to direct them aright – Jn.10:27

title: THE SLAIN FAITH
memoryVerse: God also bearing them witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will. Heb.2:4
meaning: Slain faith is the faith that has been killed, murdered, assassinated, butchered and eliminated from functioning as a child of God, and by that elimination, faith is now unjust he can no more live by faith

body.header: WHEN THE FAITH OF A SHEPHERD IS SLAIN NUM.14:1-9 (Continuation)

content.header: When the faith of a leader is slain then the people he is leading are destroyed
The people will be full of murmuring – Num.14: 2-4
list: They murmured against Moses their superior

content.header: He cannot lay down his life for the flock- Jn.15:13
He cannot witness or care for the flock – James 5:20

body.header: SOME OF THE CHARACTERISTICS OF A SLAIN FAITH

content.header: Slain faith run away from battle – Josh.7:12, Judges 2:14
list: They cannot stand real battle
They cannot stand before the enemy

title: THE SLAIN FAITH
memoryVerse: God also bearing them witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will. Heb.2:4
meaning: Slain faith is the faith that has been killed, murdered, assassinated, butchered and eliminated from functioning as a child of God, and by that elimination, faith is now unjust he can no more live by faith

body.header: SOME OF THE CHARACTERISTICS OF A SLAIN FAITH (Continuation)

content.header: They become the prisoner of hope – Eze10: 37-39
list: Hope element is taken away from them
Desire element is taken away from them
Faith element is taken away from them
Desire for God's word and soul is dead when hope is captured

content.header: They become Satan yoke carriers –Lamen.1:14, Matt.11:30
list: They begin to work for Satan – e.g. ten spies Num.14:37
They are no more working for God or themself but for Satan and the agent of darkness
The enemies tie yoke on them and they are now working for the task master

content.header: Slain faith trades off their people and land for terrorist commanders – Jn.10:10, 2Pet.2:14
list: When the enemies terrorize, the slain faith trades off the people
The slain faith give up the people and the land to the enemy that terrorize them

content.header: If the anointed man of God faith is slain, he fears the faith that worked by love and prefers the faith that worked by the love of money- Balaam – 2Pet.2:15
list: People must pay for miracle

content.header: Negative confession – Jer.29:11
list: When a man's faith is slain he cannot confess positive things about himself or family
All he sees is always negative but cannot see the good
His eyes are only open to the negative and blind to that which is good

title: THE SLAIN FAITH
memoryVerse: God also bearing them witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will. Heb.2:4
meaning: Slain faith is the faith that has been killed, murdered, assassinated, butchered and eliminated from functioning as a child of God, and by that elimination, faith is now unjust he can no more live by faith
conclusion: One of the ingredients of running a healthy Christian life is faith. Therefore let us do everything possible to keep our faith alive so that we can be able to manufacturer the good things we desire in life as we were made to understand that a man with faith is a manufacture. A man whose faith has been slain cannot manufacture any good thing.

A slain faith needs mercy, compassion and rescue restoration mission, what they need is help they cannot help themself -Gal 6:1, Is not the time to task them or else you join the devil to put more burden on them, What they need is mercy, help and support to rescue them from the hand of the devil that has slain their faith – Hosea6:6, Act15:28, Rev2:24

The bible made us to understand in Heb.10:38 that the just shall live by faith, also in Heb.11:6 we were also told that without faith it is impossible to please God. For us to please God, which is the essence of our existence we must keep our faith alive.

body.header: DEVIL'S WEAPONS OF KILLING AND DESTROYING FAITH- Jn.10:10

content.header: Fear of the giant – Num.13:33
list: Fear of future
Fear of Goliath made the soldiers of Israel to hide themselves in caves and mountain until David came to challenge him
David was a man whose faith was alive – 1Sam.17:26, 32,36

Which giant are you facing? Don't allow it to overcome you because that is what devil wants to use to kill and slain your faith, rise up in faith because the just shall live, overcome, succeed and triumph by faith.

content.header: Enemy weaponized poverty – 2Corin.8:9
list: Devil using poverty as a weapon to slain faith
Devil want you to accept poverty as your inheritance

content.header: Desire delayed or disappointment – Pro.13:12
list: Disappointment is not a denial
Delay is not a denial
These are weapons of the devil to slain your faith, don't be ignorant of devil's devices – 2Corin.2:11

title: POWERFUL KEYS IN BELONGING TO THE KINGDOM
memoryVerse: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant. Ps.25:14
meaning: To be part or member of a kingdom is through birth. A kingdom is ruled by a king. The kingdom we are looking at is God's kingdom where God is the king, and He is king all over the heavens and the earth – Ps.24:1
meaning_list: You can only belong to the kingdom of God through birth, which means you must be born again into God's kingdom –Jn.3:3

content.header: The secret place of the most high is the spirit – Rev. 1:10-19
list: In coming to the secret place of the most high you must be in the spirit
If you are not in the spirit you cannot see, hear or feel God's presence until you come to the spirit

content.header: The secret place of the most high is holy – Josh.5:14-15
list: To approach the secret place of the most high you must have Christ Jesus and the holy spirit – 1.Pet 1:16
If you are not in the spirit you cannot see, hear or feel God's presence until you come to the spirit
Only through Christ’s blood and the Holy spirit can you approach God

content.header: Spirit of truth – Luke 4:18
list: If you are in the secret place of God, you must have truth, the spirit of truth must dwell inside you

content.header: Spirit of righteousness – Is.61:3
list: You will love righteousness and hate evil

content.header: Spirit of love – Jn.3:1
list: The spirit of God's love will be in you.
You will love what God loves and hate what God hates

content.header: Spirit of light – Jn.3:20-21, Eph.5:13
Spirit of life – Is.38:16

content.header: Spirit of power – Act 1:8
Spirit of victory – 1Jn.5:4, 5:5, Rev.2:7,26
Spirit of glory – 2Tim.2:10
list: The spirit of God is not the spirit of shame or reproach but of glory and honour.

content.header: Spirit of knowledge – Titus.1:1, Is.11:2
Spirit of wisdom – Is.11:2
list: Wisdom to know how to overcome, to build, and to prosper in life.

title: POWERFUL KEYS IN BELONGING TO THE KINGDOM

meaning: To be part or member of a kingdom is through birth. A kingdom is ruled by a king. The kingdom we are looking at is God's kingdom where God is the king, and He is king all over the heavens and the earth – Ps.24:1

conclusion: the spirit of God is the spirit of liberty so let us dwell in the spirit and walk in the spirit for our liberty and peace

body.header: WHAT IS IN GOD'S SECRET PLACE (Continuation)

content.header: Spirit of understanding – Is.11:2-3
Spirit of faith – Heb.11:1
list: Faith will attract substances to you
Faith will attract favour and blessings to you e.t.c.

content.header: Spirit of hope – 1Pet.3:3, Titus.1:2
list: Don't allow anything to remove your hope, because the power of hope stretches from today to the future
Hope is a powerful vision to see the future
Hope makes you to move into the future with boldness

content.header: Spirit of eternal life – Jn3:15, Rom6:23, Titus1:2
list: God called us to eternity to fellowship with him
God called us to partake of his eternal spirit and to live with him eternally.

content.header: Spirit of Judgment – Is.11:3-4
list: If You don't have the spirit of Judgment you can be making errors and mistake that are very costly in judgment
The spirit of judgment makes you sound in your decisions and planning.

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

content.header: A compromiser is a man standing between Christ and the devil.
A compromiser has two faces (Half face of light and half face of darkness)
When the spirit of compromise takes over a man; he is partially for God and partially for the devil. Part of the man is dark and the other part is keeping some light.
God doesn't operate in the atmosphere of compromise
Compromise is a destroyer of life’s substance

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

body.header: WHO GAINS FROM COMPROMISE?

content.header: When a man compromises who gains from it is not God but the devil. The man starts his journey with a divided attention but as he continues to stay without repentance or without coming out of it, darkness will increase in him. He is fifty percent (50%) light and fifty percent (50%) darkness but as he remains in that state, darkness will be making more profits for the devil, He will later increase in darkness to sixty percent (60%) and only forty percent (40%) is left for God, He will increase further to seventy percent (70%, 80%, 90%,) In this case a believer will still be physically performing his duty in the house of God, but just on the surface. He will still be present in the fellowships but he has been almost bought fully by darkness.
list: Now at this point, he takes the name of the Lord God in vain. Ex.20:7

content.header: The word compromise is a product of two loyalty’s words COM andPROMISE.
We were called and chosen by God, for him to be our Lord, Master husbandman etc.
He called us because he loves us. God wants to marry us as a wife and to use us as a vessel

COM- PROMISE is a one who gave his promise/pledge to God but by allurement and enticement from darkness he then gave another contrary promise/pledge to the devil. Since the promises are given to God and to the devil, it will no longer be regarded as in a singular word PROMISE but COM-PROMISE which is COMPROMISE
list: We are to keep our promise to God and never to look backLuke 9:62

title: REVISION AND GENERAL QUESTION AND ANSWER IN RESPECT OF ALL THE TOPICS COVERED IN THIS MANUAL FROM JANUARY– MARCH2024
COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

body.header: WHO IS A COMPROMISER?

content.header: A compromiser is somebody who gives his pledge, loyalty to God and at the same time gives his pledge and loyalty to the devil.
list: A compromiser will not have the true fire –Jn.5:35
A compromiser cannot endure a sound doctrine – 2Tim.4:3
A compromiser give's double pledges (double pledger) – James 1:8
A compromiser can never be enlisted or call upon as a judge to seat or preside over an issue. Jn.7:24

He judges an issue without proper direction and he has no solution to issues, because he cannot go into the truth of a matter, his judgment and decision are full of compromise - James 1:8, Matt. 6:24, Luke 12:47.
You cannot drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of devil; ye cannot be partakers of the Lord's Table and of the table of devil. –Matt.6:24

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

body.header: WHO IS A COMPROMISER (Continuation)

content.header: Corrupter – 2Tim.3:6
Messenger of Satan- Pro.13:17
He represents Satan in the midst of God people in the light- 2Corin.11:14
Compromise is a union of fidelity and infidelity – Matt.6:24
A compromiser is deceiver –Titus 1:10
A compromiser is disabled- Luke 6:39

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

body.header: WHO IS A COMPROMISER (Continuation)

content.header: A compromiser is a glorified antichrist in the midst of God's people-2Jn.1:7
A compromiser is an impersonator- Mk.13:6,Matt.24:24
A compromiser gives double allegiance – Matt.6:24

A compromiser is a wise representative of the devil that is not foolish, he is full of wisdom of the serpent so he will appear outwardly before the people with the nature of sheep outwardly. Matt.10:16
list: They have the word-ology of praise, thanksgiving and quotes the scripture more than the believers but inwardly they are ravening wolves. An encounter with them changes dream, that's why one has to be alert by communicating with God in prayer to expose them.

content.header: Bible said, you should try all spirits, whether they are of God.
list: The person you open your heart to unknowing he is an agent of the devil if you believe him you become his New Convert and he will translate you from the kingdom of light to the kingdom of darkness

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

body.header: WHAT COMPROMISER LACKS

content.header: A compromiser has no composition, momentum of God’s glory and energy in him
He lacks zeal and passion Gal.1:14
He has no regard for time, management and appointment
He does not have respect for God, programmes and meetings
He has no power and force
He has no confidence
list: He is not sure of himself and what he can do.
He is not loyal to God
Through his word and action you will notice lack of confidence.

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

body.header: WHAT COMPROMISER LACKS (CONTINUATION)

content.header: Trustworthiness- A compromiser cannot be trusted, No serious commitment should be given to compromiser, doing so is destructive
He is unproductive to God and cannot bring profit/gain to Gods kingdom.
He lacks hope
He lacks fitness. Luke.9:62
He lacks the element of friendship – Amos 3:3
list: As friends of God, we need to develop the factors of friendship

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

body.header: THE POTENTIAL DANGER OF THE SPIRIT AND LIFE OF COMPROMISE

content.header: Name is wiped out, deleted or removed from the book of life.
list: During Compromise, there is an eraser in the hand of the devil that he puts in a compromiser’s hand to erase his name, blessings from the book of life because the devil hates the good things that God put in a man, so during compromise, wisdom, knowledge and understanding of God is erased from the person.

content.header: Emptiness
list: The spirit of compromise is an emptier that empties a man of his honour, glory, promotion and good things of life .

content.header: A compromiser is unable to abide in the truth so he departs from the truth.
list: Compromise enleavens the whole lump and turns the whole lump to darkness. Gal.5:9, 1Corin.5:6

content.header: Compromise nullifies the laws and principles of the knowledge of truth
list: When a believer is in error of compromise he will be reduced to nothing and whenever he does what is wrong he will never genuinely repent.

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.

body.header: REASONS FOR COMPROMISE

content.header: Fear -Fear of insecurity
list: A fearful man will always compromise

content.header: Absence of boldness
Lack of integrity – lack uprightness
Incompetence – unable to function or act properly.
Frightful before the rod of dominion and subduership
list: People compromise when they meet with higher officer who has the rod of dominion and subduership.

content.header: Lack of vision and direction-Pro29:18
The deceitfulness of human psychology
list: Father Abraham was a prophet who had the Spirit of discernment. Abraham was able to discern that the people in that place lust over women and have no fear of God and that they will take away his wife, He would have asked God for direction but immediately switched over to human psychology. He did not trust on the faith, power, and love of God, he then droped to human diplomacy and almost lost his wife. Perfect love cast out fear 1Jn.4:18

title: COMPROMISE
memoryVerse: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways – James 1:8
meaning: compromise is agreement, bargain or settlement to accept less than what you originally wanted.
conclusion: The life of compromise involves loyalties to two masters and two laws, inability to keep your promise whichyou made initially to God that you will not turn from him.
Let us hold fast our confidence to the end without wavering because the devil is going about seeking who to entice and make to compromise with him- Heb.3:6, 10:23

body.header: COST OF COMPROMISE (GEN.20:1-14)

content.header: Loss of vision and mission : Abraham would have lost his vision and mission
list: Because the heir shall come from Sarah who will carry on the vision God gave to him

content.header: Compromise destroys marriage– Abraham’s marriage would have been destroyed by compromise if not God’s divine intervention that restored his wife.
Annulment of the precious promises of God – All the precious promise of God to Abraham would have been annulled.
A perverse seed and a perverse generation Gen.20:1-5
list: The seed that will come out from compromise will perverse and will become generation of perversion-Luke9:41.
Compromise will raise a corrupt seed that will turn aside from the good way - Joshua.24:15

content.header: Compromise brings rejection and demotion –1Sam.15:23,26.
Compromise causes affliction, shame and disgrace
list: Exampleof affliction is Jonah when he compromised the direction of God- Jonah.1,2.
Example of shame and disgrace was when King Saul compromise the instruction of God in Amalek, what followed the rejection was shame and disgrace1Sam.18:1-9

content.header: Compromise brings death. Both spiritual and physical death. – 1Kings 13:1-24, king Soul

title: GOD GLOROIUS REWARD FOR CONTINUANCE
memoryVerse: He that is not with me is against me; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad. Matt.12:30
meaning: who is in agreement with God, His will, purpose and ways?

content.header: Is either you are for God or for the enemies of God –Josh.5:13
If you are on the Lord side you will go after the things of God and not other way- 2Sam.20:11
If you are on the Lord side you will render to God the things which are Gods- Matt.22:21. e.g. Honour, Thanksgiving, Praise. Etc.
Some Ministers, Pastors, Elders, Members, don't know where they belong to
If you are on the Lord’s side you must be ready to suffer with him for the gospel sake-Act 9:16, Rom.8:17, Matt.12:30

title: GOD GLOROIUS REWARD FOR CONTINUANCE
memoryVerse: He that is not with me is against me; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad. Matt.12:30
meaning: who is in agreement with God, His will, purpose and ways?

body.header: HOW TO BE ON THE LORD SIDE

content.header: Abide – Jn.15:3-7
list: To be on the Lord side you must abide in your calling, mission, teachings by following the pattern and ways laid down by your master or mentor
The pattern of one ministry might be different from another ministry but by the same Spirit of God.

One mentor or master pattern might be different from another but by the same Spirit e.g. Apostle Peter approach might be different from Apostle Paul but the same Spirit of God working in both -1Corin.3:4-6

content.header: Abide and continue in the word of God - Jn.8:31.
Abide and obey authority God has set to watch over youHeb.13:17, 1Pet.5:5.
list: You are not on the Lord’s side when you disobey and disrespect authority over you. Eph.6:1, Is.1:19

content.header: Abide and follow the voice of the good shepherd – Jn.10:5
list: When you follow the voice of a stranger you are not on the Lord’s side
Stranger is not the good shepherd so he comes in through other means and not through the Door

content.header: Abide and continue in God's Love- Jn.15:9, Rev.2:6,15.
list: To be in God’s side you must be lover of what God loves and hater of what God hates (God hate all unrighteousness)

title: GOD GLOROIUS REWARD FOR CONTINUANCE
memoryVerse: He that is not with me is against me; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad. Matt.12:30
meaning: who is in agreement with God, His will, purpose and ways?

body.header: HOW TO BE ON THE LORD’S SIDE (Continuation)

content.header: Abide and contend for the faith- Jude 1:3
list: Defend the faith with all your strength
Example of those that defend the faith are David, Daniel, Joshua etc

content.header: Abide and obey your parent in the Lord- Eph.6:1-3

body.header: THE GLORIOUS REWARD FOR CONTINUITY

content.header: It makes you a true disciple of Christ. Jn.8:31
It makes you a true disciple of Christ. Jn.8:31
list: God’s presence is always with you and go with you Ex.33:14

title: GOD GLOROIUS REWARD FOR CONTINUANCE
memoryVerse: He that is not with me is against me; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad. Matt.12:30
meaning: who is in agreement with God, His will, purpose and ways?
conclusion: Not being on the Lord’s side brings pains, afflictions, sufferings and finally brings death and eternal condemnation. My beloved brethren it is better to be on the Lord side than to be on the opposite side and suffer eternal condemnation

body.header: THE GLORIOUS REWARD FOR CONTINUITY (Continuation)

content.header: God justifies and glorifies you- Rom.8:30
It brings recommendation and promotion - Pro.4:8,Ps.75:6
Your name is written in the book of life – Phil.4:3,Rev.20:15
You shall reign with Christ eternally - Jn.14;3
When you call upon the Lord, He will answer you. 2Sam.22:4
